name: autohide the menu & sidebar [PCMag]
description: Hides the PC Mag header, footer, and sidebar. (But not permanently - hover at the edges of the screen to restore them.)
additional_info: The narrow bars at the left edge of the screen are the collapsed header, sidebar, and footer. Mouse over them to restore the element. 2016-01-14: PC Mag changed element identifiers on some pages, but not all. This update resolves most of the changes. Screenshot URL: 2015 PC Shipment Decline 'Largest in History' TiVo Lays Off Design Team, Denies it will Ditch Hardware Biz
